nodes.text: The Heavy Champion was a combat repulsorcraft employed by the Royal Naboo Security Forces, similar in firepower to a Heavy AAT. It was the successor to the original Champion.
The Heavy Champion was a repulsorcraft, equipped with 3 blaster cannons; 1 blaster cannon at the rear of the vehicle and 2 frontal blaster cannon.

These units saw action during the First Battle of Harte Secur alongside Champions (the Heavy Champions predecessors) to protect the Harte Secur's command center when OOM-9's invading forces attacked the city. However, most of the Heavy Champions were destroyed.

In the game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds the model is a Mech Destroyer and only appears in the second mission of the Trade Federation's campaign (First Battle of Harte Secur) and it isn't a playable unit. In the standard game, the unit is not available.
